ideas.title: Comprehensive system audit fixes
ideas.description: Fixed 16 HIGH and MEDIUM priority issues from 4-agent audit including: path traversal security, exception handling, cache limits, depth limits, input validation
details: Fixed silent fallback chains in hybrid_search.py
Fixed bare except clauses in memory_db.py
Fixed unclosed file handles in memory_db.py migrations
Added disk cache size limits (100MB max, 500 entries)
Added memory cache eviction (1000 entry limit)
Fixed exception handling in ollama_client.py and error_logger.py
